meanings.definition: The act of joining or sewing together pieces of fabric.
meanings.sent1: Her seaming of the dress was neat and precise.
meanings.sent2: The seaming on the pillowcase was done by hand.
meanings.sent3: The seaming on the curtains made them look like they were dancing.
meanings.sent4: The seaming of the quilt held together memories of the past.
meanings.sent5: With each seaming, the fabric transformed into something beautiful.

meanings.definition: The line where two pieces of fabric are sewn together.
meanings.sent1: The seaming on the jacket was perfectly straight.
meanings.sent2: She ironed the seaming to make it lay flat.
meanings.sent3: The seaming on the skirt seemed to shimmer in the light.
meanings.sent4: The seaming on the bag held all her essentials in place.
meanings.sent5: The seaming on the tablecloth added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: The process of finishing a garment by sewing or pressing the seams.
meanings.sent1: After the seaming was complete, the dress looked polished.
meanings.sent2: She learned the art of seaming from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The seaming on the shirt gave it a professional touch.
meanings.sent4: The seaming on the jacket was the final touch of perfection.
meanings.sent5: Her seaming skills improved with each project she completed.
